style.css:
@-moz-document domain("ck101.com") {
div[id="image_ad_short"],
div[id="image_ad_long"],
*[class="videoFocus"],
div[class="a_cn"],
ins[class="adsbygoogle"],
iframe[title="fb:page Facebook Social Plugin"],
div[class="userPurview cl pob"],
div[style="height:90px; width:728px;"],
div[class="adBox"],
div[class="imgAd"],
div[class=imgAd],
div[id="scbar"],
ins>iframe[style="border: 0px; overflow: hidden;"],
ins[class="scupioadslot"] {
	display: none !important;
}
}
